mapper.select: SELECT A.i_board, A.title, A.ctnt, B.nick, A.r_dt FROM t_board A LEFT JOIN t_user B ON A.i_user = B.i_user ORDER BY A.r_dt DESC limit #{startIndex}, #{pageSize}
SELECT A.i_board, A.title, A.r_dt, B.nick FROM t_board A LEFT JOIN t_user B ON A.i_user = B.i_user WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') limit #{startIndex}, #{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(i_board) FROM t_board WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')

SELECT A.i_board, A.i_user, A.title, A.ctnt, A.image_1, A.image_2, A.image_3, A.image_4, A.hits, A.r_dt, B.nick, B.i_user, B.profile_img FROM t_board A LEFT JOIN t_user B ON A.i_user = B.i_user WHERE i_board = #{i_board}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_board SET hits = hits + 1 WHERE i_board = #{i_board}
